name: HoopsToGlory
content: This is a game about climbing the ranks of basketball stardom, where you start as a hopeful young player with the dream of becoming the next big thing.

name: HoopsToGlory
content: This is a race to the number 1 pick in the draft. Fastest player wins!

name: HoopsToGlory
content: Autosave is on, you can always close the page & come back later. There is no offline progress.

name: HoopsToGlory
content: Desktop is recommended for optimal experience & performance.

name: HoopsToGlory
content: Please share the game if you enjoyed it. Have fun!

name: HoopsToGlory
content: Make sure you recover before completing another training session.

name: HoopsToGlory
content: Well done you've unlocked the ability to play games, make the most of it to show what you're made of!

name: HoopsToGlory
content: You're now able to choose an endorsement / upgrade when you reach specific milestones.

milestone: Become Number One NBA Draft Pick
name: HoopsToGlory
